Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
AllowFetchers_Description: If true, Add POP3 Fetcher option becomes available in Email Accounts area of Settings screen
FetchersCronMpopDataFolder_Description: Defines location of mailserver data directory
FetchersCronDeliveryScript_Description: Defines location of local delivery agent
FetchersIntervalMinutes_Description: Interval of running fetcher script, in minutes; should match the interval set in cronjob
UserDefaultQuotaMB_Description: Default size for new mailboxes created, in Mbytes
